article_title: Red Bank to conduct Thursday DWI check
article_text:
Red Bank Police Department will conduct a DWI checkpoint on Riverside Avenue on Thursday (Photo: Getty Images/iStockphoto)

Red Bank Police Department will conduct a DWI checkpoint on Riverside Avenue on Thursday, starting at 11 p.m.

Lacey man charged with DUI, tried to escape police

In addition to Thursday’s checkpoint, the police department will be conducting increased DWI patrols through the holiday season.

Snooki’s new husband Jionni LaValle pleads guilty to DUI

Contact Ford at aford@app.com or 732-643-4281.

Read or Share this story: http://on.app.com/1ADI4vv
